snippet: Beth Saidel and Joe Profaci watched “Love Story” together (more or less) decades ago, but it took much longer for their romance to develop.
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Beth Saidel and Joe Profaci.
lead_paragraph: Beth Saidel and Joe Profaci watched “Love Story” together (more or less) decades ago, but it took much longer for their romance to develop.

headline.main: A Love Story That Had to Wait
headline.print_headline: A Love Story That Had to Wait
